name: OBEY (itch) ([index])
description:
We are in a war against the rebels!

The orders are to find and eliminate the leaders of the resistance.

Will you OBEY?

Control Sergeant Piper in his search for the truth against rebel forces in this side-scroller shooter.

PC requirements:

Minimum:

  • CPU: i3 4-generation or equivalent 
  • RAM: 2GB DDR3
  • GPU: Nvidia GeForce 9400 GT or equivalent

Recommended:

  • CPU: i7 5-generation or equivalent
  • RAM: 6GB DDR3
  • GPU: Nvidia GeForce GTX 950 or equivalent
